data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Al Bahr al Ahmar, Egypt to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Bahr al Ahmar, Egypt
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Al Bahr al Ahmar, Egypt.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 12,819 believers in Al Bahr al Ahmar to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Lord, the believers in the state of Al Bahr al Ahmar, Egypt need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab, Sudanese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, it’s possible most of the 250,360 lost people in  Al Bahr al Ahmar, Egypt have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Al Bahr al Ahmar, Egypt to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Al Bahr al Ahmar with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
